src: "Sasa tuna panya wenye umri wa miezi minne ambao hawana kisukari ambao awali walikuwa na kisukari", aliongeza.
mt: "Now we have four-month-old rats who are diabetic who previously were not diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dak. Ehud Ur, profesa wa udaktari katika chuo kikuu cha Dalhousie kule Halifix, Nova Scotia na mwenyekiti wa kitengo cha kliniki na kisayansi kwenye ushirika wa ugonjwa wa kisukari nchini Canada alionya kuwa utafiti bado uko kwenye siku za mapema.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific committee of the Canadian Diabetes Association, said the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kama wataalam wengine, ana shaka kuhusu kama ugonjwa wa kisukari unaweza kutibiwa, akagundua kuwa matokeo haya hayana umuhimu kwa watu ambao tayari wana ugojwa wa kisukari wa aina 1.
mt: As other experts have said, he has doubts about whether diabetes can be cured, having found that these results are not important for people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Mnamo Jumatatu, Sara Danius, katibu wa kudumu wa Kamati ya Nobel ya Fasihi katika Chuo cha Uswidi, alitangaza hadharani wakati wa kipindi cha redio kwenye Sveriges Radio katika Uswidi kwamba kamati hiyo, kwa kutoweza kumfikia Bob Dylan moja kwa moja kuhusu ushindi wa Tuzo la Nobel la Fasihi 2016, iliacha juhudi zake za kujaribu kumfikia.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced on air during a radio broadcast on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the academy, after failing to reach Bob Dylan directly about his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius alisema, "Sasa hivi hatufanyi chochote. Nimepiga simu na kutuma barua pepe kwa mshirika wake wa karibu na kupata majibu ya kirafiki sana. Kwa sasa, hakika hiyo imetosha."
mt: Danius said, "Right now we're doing nothing. I've called a close friend and sent him a friendly email, and he's responded very quickly. That's all I can do."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Hapo awali, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Ring, Jamie Siminoff, alitamka kampuni hiyo ilianza wakati kengele yake ya mlangoni haikuwa inasikika katika duka lake kwenye karakana yake.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had said the company started when his front doorbell wasn't ringing in his store on a kiosk.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Aliunda kengele ya mlango ya Wi-Fi, alisema.
mt: He installed a Wi-Fi router, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff alisema mauzo yaliongezeka baada ya yeye kuonekana katika kipindi cha Shark Tank mnamo 2013 ambapo paneli ya onyesho hilo ilikataa kufadhili biashara hiyo mpya.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on the Shark Tank in 2013, when the show's panel rejected funding the new business.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Baadaye 2017, Siminoff alionekana katika chaneli ya ununuzi ya televisheni QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring pia alitatua mashtaka ya kampuni pinzani ya usalama, Shirika la ADT.
mt: He also cleared charges against the security company, ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Huku chanjo moja ya majaribio ikionekana kupunguza vifo kutokana na Ebola, hadi kufikia sasa, hakuna dawa zimeonyeshwa dhahiri kufaa kutibu maambukizo yaliyoko.
mt: 1 of 4 experimental vaccines appears to reduce Ebola deaths, but no proven cure has been shown yet.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Kinywaji kimoja cha kingamwili, ZMapp, hapo awali kilionyesha ahadi uwanjani, lakini tafiti rasmi zilionyesha kilikuwa na faida kidogo kuliko ilivyotafutwa katika kuzuia kifo.
mt: 1 of 2 experimental drugs, ZMapp, previously showed promise in the field, but official trials showed it had little benefit in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Katika jaribio la PALM, Zmapp ilitumika kama kidhibiti, kumaanisha wanasayansi waliitumia kama msingi na kulinganisha matibabu mengine matatu nayo.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning researchers used it as a standard and compared it to other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics hukubali barua ya Kamati ya Olimpiki ya Marekani na hukubali hitaji kuu la familia ya Olimpiki la kukuza mazingira salama kwa wanariadha wetu wote.
mt: USA Gymnastics accepts the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and acknowledges the committee's primary concern of ensuring a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Tunakubaliana na taarifa ya USOC kwamba masilahi ya wanariadha na vilabu vyetu, na spoti yao, huenda yakashughulikiwa vyema kwa kusonga mbele na mabadiliko ya maana ndani ya shirika letu, badala ya kughairi vyeti.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that our athletes and our teams, and their coaches, will be well served by the changes in meaning within our organization, rather than by ignoring the issues.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics inaunga mkono uchunguzi huru ambao labda utafafanua jinsi unyanyasaji wa kiwango kama vile ulivyoelezewa kwa ujasiri sana na manusura wa Larry Nassar ungekosa kugunduliwa kwa muda mrefu hivyo na inakumbatia mabadiliko muhimu na ya kufaa.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may have revealed sexual abuse of the kind described in detail and with candor by Larry Nassar over a long period of time, and commends the important and necessary changes made.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics na USOC zina lengo moja — kuifanya spoti ya sarakasi, na nyingine, salama iwezekanavyo ili wanariadha wafuate ndoto zao katika mazingira salama, chanya na ya kuwezesha.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have one goal — to make the sport safe, and as safe as possible, so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, healthy and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Katika miaka yote ya 1960, Brzezinski alimfanyia kazi John F. Kennedy kama mshauri wake na pia utawala wa Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Wakati wa uteuzi wa 1976, alimshauri Carter kuhusu sera ya nje, kisha akafanya kazi kama Mshauri wa Usalama wa Kitaifa (NSA) kutoka 1977 hadi 1981, na alichukua hatamu kutoka kwa Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then worked as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, and took over from Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Kama NSA, alimsaidia Carter katika kushughulikia masuala ya dunia kidiplomasia, kama vile Mikataba ya Kambi David, 1978; kurekebisha uhusiano wa Marekani na China mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1970; Mapinduzi ya Irani, ambayo yalipelekea janga la mateka la Irani, 1979; na shambulio la Kisovyeti katika Afganistani, 1979.
mt: As NSA, he helped Carter deal with foreign policy issues, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; repairing U.S. relations with China in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Sinema, iliyoshirikisha Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone ilipata uteuzi katika kategoria zote kuu.
mt: La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling na Stone walipokea uteuzi wa Muigizaji na Mwigizaji wa kike Bora mtawalia.
mt: Gosling and Stone were awarded Best Actor and Best Actress in a Leading Role.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Uteuzi mwingine unahusisha Picha, Mwelekezi, Sinema, Muundo wa Mavazi, Uhariri wa Filamu, Alama ya Asili, Muundo wa Uzalishaji, Uhariri wa Sauti, Uchanganyaji wa Sauti na Mchezo Halisi wa Skrini Bora.
mt: Another nomination includes: Picture, Guide, Film, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Best Live Action Short.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Nyimbo mbili kutoka kwa sinema, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na Mji wa Nyota, zilipendekezwa kuwa nyimbo bora asilia. Studio ya Lionsgate ilipendekezwa mara 26 – zaidi ya studio nyingine yoyote.
mt: 2 songs from a movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for original songs. Lionsgate studio was nominated for the 26th time – more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Mwishoni mwa Jumapili, Rais wa Marekani Donald Trump, katika taarifa iliyowasilishwa kupitia katibu wa uandishi wa habari, alitangaza kwamba vikosi vya Marekani vitaondoka Siria.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement released through press secretary, announced that U.S. forces will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Tangazo lilifanywa baada ya Trump kuwa na mazungumzo ya simu na Rais wa Uturuki Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Uturuki ilikua yachukua ulinzi wa wapiganaji wa ISIS waliotekwa ambao, tangazo lilisema kuwa, nchi za Ulaya zilikataa kurudi.
mt: Turkey took custody of ISIS fighters captured, a statement said, who the European countries refused to take back.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Hii haithibitishi tu kuwa baadhi ya dinosaria walikuwa na manyoya, nadharia ambayo tayari imezagaa, bali pia inatoa maelezo ambayo kijumla visukuku haviwezi, kama vile rangi na mpangilio wa pande-tatu.
mt: This does not prove that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has already gained traction, but also provides details that a whole flock of birds cannot, such as color and arrangement of the three parts.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Wanasayansi wanasema manyoya ya mnyama huyu yalikuwa ya rangi ya kahawia-nyekundu upande wa juu na hafifu au rangi ya karotini upande wa chini.
mt: . Scientists say this animal's feathers were light brown on top and a dull or orange-red on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Utambuzi huo pia unatoa ufahamu wa mageuko ya manyoya katika ndege.
mt: The tool also provides information about the growth of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Kwa sababu manyoya ya dinosau hayana chimbuko uliyostawishwa vizuri, inayoitwa rachi, lakini huwa na sifa zingine za manyoya — barbu na barbule — watafiti waligundua rachi labda ni maendeleo ya baadaye ya uvumbuzi kuliko sifa hizi nyingine.
mt: Because the dinosaur's feathers lacked a clear evolutionary precursor, the trait known as down, but also other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — researchers found that down may have been a later evolutionary development than these other traits.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Muundo wa manyoya unaonyesha kwamba hayakutumika katika kupeperuka bali yalitumiwa kudhibiti joto au uonyesho. Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, ingawa huu ni mkia wa dinosauri mchanga, sampuli inaonyesha manyoya ya utu uzima na si manyoya laini ya ndani ya kifaranga.
mt: The arrangement of the feathers suggests they were not used for insulation but rather to regulate temperature or display. Researchers suggested that, although this is a fossil of a sauropod, the sample shows living feathers and not the hollow, internal feathers of a bird.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Watafiti walipendekeza kwamba, hata kama huu ni mkia wa dinosau mdogo, sampuli hiyo inaonyesha manyoya ya ukubwa na si manyoya ya kifaranga mdogo.
mt: The researchers suggested that, even if this is a small dinosaur tail, the sample shows large feathers and not small downy feathers.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomu la gari lililolipuliwa katika hedikota ya polisi katika Gaziantep, Uturuki jana asubuhi liliwaua maafisa wawili wa polisi na kuwajeruhi watu wengine zaidi ya ishirini.
mt: A bomb that exploded in the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ofisi ya Gavana ilisema kumi na tisa wa wale waliojeruhiwa walikuwa maafisa wa polisi.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi walisema wanashuku wanaodaiwa kuwa wanamgambo wa Daesh (ISIL) kwa kuhusika na shambulio hilo.
mt: Police said they were seeking suspects believed to be members of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) for their involvement in the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Walipata kuwa Jua lilifanya kazi kwa kanuni msingi sawa na za nyota nyingine: Shuguli za nyota zote kwenye mfumo zilipatikana kuendeshwa na mng'ao wao, mzunguko wao na hakuna jingine.
mt: They found that the Sun behaved like other stars: All stars in the system were driven by their mass, rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Mng'ao na mzunguko hutumika pamoja ili kuamua namba ya Rossby ya nyota, ambayo inahusiana na mtiririko wa utegili.
mt: The speed and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of the star, which is related to the rate of rotation.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Jinsi idadi ya Rossby inavyokuwa ndogo, ndivyo nyota zinapungua kuwa wa utendaji kwa kuzingatia mabadiliko ya sumaku.
mt: As the number of Rossby is small, the stars are reduced to be of performance by considering changes in the atmosphere.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Wakati wa safari yake, Iwasaki alikumbwa na matata mara nyingi.
mt: During his trip, Iwasaki was often troubled.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Aliporwa na maharamia, akashambuliwa huko Tibeti na mbwa mwenye kichaa, akakwepa ndoa katika Nepali na akakamatwa huko India.
mt: 1. Kidnapped by pirates, attacked by a Tibetan dog with a bone, refused marriage in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Kiwango cha 802.11n hufanya kazi katika masafa ya gigahezi 2.4 na gigahezi 5.0.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4 and 5.0 GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Hii itaiwezesha kutangamana kwa nyuma na 802.11a, 802.11b na 802.11g, mradi tu kituo cha ardhini kina redio mbili.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g backwards compatibility will be possible with a single radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Kasi za 802.11n ni haraka sana kuliko zile za watangulizi wake zikiwa upeo wa kinadharia wa kiwango cha juu cha 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much faster than its predecessors, with a theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ambaye ameolewa na ana watoto waliokomaa, hakuacha hisia kubwa kwa Miller, ambayehadithi ilimhusu.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has grown children, did not leave a large estate for Miller, who was the subject of a recent story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Alipoambiwa atoe maoni, Miller alisema, "Mike huongea sana wakati wa kesi…nilikuwa najitayarisha kwa hivyo sikuwa ninasikia kwa kweli alichokuwa akisema."
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during trials…so I was preparing for that, so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Tutajaribu kupunguza utoaji wa dayoksidi ya kaboni kwa kila kipimo cha GDP kwa kiwango muhimu kufikia 2020 kutoka kiwango cha 2005", Hu alisema.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Hakuweka kiwango cha kukatwa, akisema itafanywa kulingana na pato la kiuchumi la China.
mt: He said it would be done according to China's economic development level.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu aliimiza nchi zinazokua “kuepuka njia ya kitambo ya kuchafua kwanza na kusafisha baadaye.’’
mt: He urged developing countries to “avoid the path of first burn and then clean up.”
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Aliongeza kwamba "hawapaswi, hata hivyo, kuombwa kuchukua wajibu ambao ni zaidi ya hatua yao ya ukuaji, uwajibikaji na uwezo."
mt: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take responsibility that is beyond their growth, accountability and capacity."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Kikundi cha Wasomi wa Iraq kiliwasilisha ripoti yao saa 12 GMT leo.
mt: 12 GMT today, Iraq's scientists submitted their report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Inatoa ilani kwamba hakuna yeyote anayeweza kutoa hakikisho kwamba mpango wowote wa hatua katika Iraki wakati huu utakomesha vita vya kimadhehebu, vurugu inayozidi, au mwelekeo kwenye machafuko.
mt: It states that no one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this time will stop sectarian violence, the growing chaos, or the direction towards anarchy.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ripoti hiyo inaanza kwa ombi la mjadala wazi na kuundwa kwa maafikiano katika Marekani kuhusu sera kuhusu Mashariki ya Kati.
mt: The report begins with an open call for debate and the formation of agreements in the United States regarding the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ripoti hiyo inashutumu vikali karibu kila kipengele cha sera ya sasa ya Mtendaji kuhusu Iraki na inahimiza ubadilishaji wa mwelekeo mara moja.
mt: The report sharply criticizes nearly every aspect of the current commander's strategy and calls for an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Kwanza kati ya mapendekezo yake 78 ni kwamba mpango mpya wa kidiplomasia unapaswa kuchukuliwa kabla ya mwisho wa mwaka huu ili kuweka katika hali ya usalama mipaka ya Iraq dhidi ya uingiliaji wa maadui na kuanzisha tena uhusiano wa kidiplomasia na majirani zake.
mt: 78 of his proposals is that a new diplomatic plan should be taken before the end of this year to put Iraq's borders in a state of security against enemy infiltration and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Seneta wa sasa na Mke wa Rais wa Ajentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner alitangaza uwaniaji wake wa urais jana jioni katika La Plata, mji ulio kilomita 50 (maili 31) kutoka Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Senator and President's Wife Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Bi. Kirchner alitangaza nia yake ya kuwania urais katika Ukumbi wa Ajentina, mahali pale pale alipotumia kuanzisha kampeni yake ya Seneti mnamo 2005 kama memba wa ujumbe wa wilaya ya Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the Argentine Congress, the same place she used to launch her Senate campaign in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires district delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Mjadala ulianzishwa na mzozo juu ya kutumia zaidi kwa msaada na ujenzi upya katika Kimbunga Katrina; ambacho wahafidhina wa fedha wabebandika kwa ucheshi “Mpango wa Bushwa New Orleans.”
mt: The debate was sparked by a dispute over using more for aid and rebuilding in New Orleans' Lower Ninth Ward; which FEMA officials have called "Bush's New Orleans Plan."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ukosoaji huru wa juhudi za ujenzi upya umezingatia utoaji wa kandarasi za ujenzi upya kwa wajuzi wanaodhaniwa wa Washington.
mt: A free review of new construction efforts has focused on the delivery of new construction materials to subcontractors believed to be in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Watu zaidi ya milioni nne walienda Roma kuhudhuria mazishi.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Idadi ya watu waliokuwepo ilikuwa kubwa sana kwamba haikuwezekana kwa kila mtu kupata kuingia kwenye mazishi katika uwanja wa St. Peter.
mt: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everyone to enter the St. Peter's cemetery.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Skrini kadhaa kubwa za televisheni ziliangikwa mahali mbalimbali jijini Roma ili kuwezesha watu kutazama sherehe hiyo.
mt: Several large TV screens were placed in various locations in Rome to allow people to watch the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Katika miji mingine mingi ya Italia na ulimwengu kwa ujumla, haswa katika Polandi, mipangilio sawa ilifanywa, ambayo ilionekana na idadi kubwa ya watu.
mt: In other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, the same pattern was made, which was seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Wanahistoria wameshutumu sera za zamani za FBI kwa kuangazia rasilimali kwenye kesi ambazo ni rahisi kutatua, hasa kesi za magari yaliyoibwa, kwa madhumuni ya kuongeza kiwango cha mafanikio cha wakala.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies of emphasizing resources on cases that are easily solved, especially car bombing cases, for the purpose of increasing the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Bunge lilianza kufadhili kikundi chenye nia chafu katika mwaka wa kifedha wa 2005 na kuaini kuwa FBI lazima itoe makachero kumi kwa ponografia ya watu wazima.
mt: 2005 budget funded a group with a hidden agenda and declared that the FBI must provide ten witnesses for adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa alifanya alama za juu za fursa, pointi 70 katika mipira 41 kwa kufikia nne 11 na sita 2.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored a match-winning 70 in 41 balls, reaching 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Wachezaji wa kati wa kriketi, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, walicheza vizuri na kushirikiana katika masafa mia moja.
mt: Middle-order cricketers Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid played well and cooperated in scoring 100 runs.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Lakini, baada ya kupoteza wiketi ya kapteni India ilifanya pointi 36 na kupoteza wiketi 7 kumaliza fursa.
mt: 36. But after losing the captain's point India made point 7 to end the chance.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Rais wa Marekani George W. Bush alifika Singapori asubuhi ya Novemba 16, hivyo kuanza ziara ya Asia ya wiki moja.
mt: 16 November 2005, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, thus beginning his one-week Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Alisalimiwa na Naibu Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Wong Kan Seng na wakajadili masuala ya biashara na ughaidi na Waziri Mkuu wa Singapori Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was received by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed business and security issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Baada ya wiki ya kushindwa katika uchaguzi wa nusu muhula, Bush aliambia hadhira kuhusu upanuzi wa biashara katika Asia.
mt: After a week of defeat in the midterm elections, Bush told a press conference about the expansion of business in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Waziri Mkuu Stephen Harper amekubali kutuma ‘Mkataba wa Hewa Safi’ wa serikali kwa kamati ya vyama vyote kwa ukaguzi, kabla ya kusomwa kwake kwa mara ya pili, baada ya mkutano wa Jumanne wa dakika 25 na kiongozi wa NDP Jack Layton kwenye PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's "clean air" bill to a committee of all parties for review, before it is read for a second time, after a 25-minute meeting on Monday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton alikuwa ameomba mabadiliko ya mswada wa kimazingira wa wahafidhina wakati wa mkutano na PM, akiomba “uandishi upya wa undani na mkamilifu” wa mswada wa kimazingira wa chama cha Wahafidhina.
mt: Layton had asked for changes to the environment bill during a meeting with the PM, asking for "a complete rewrite" of the Greens' environment bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Tangu Serikali ya Shirikisho ilipoingilia kati kuhusu ufadhili wa hospitali ya Mersey katika Davenport, Tasmania, serikali ya jimbo na baadhi ya wabunge wa shirikisho wameshutumu kitendo hiki kama sarakasi kabla ya uchaguzi wa kishirika utakaofanyika mnamo Novemba.
mt: Since the federal government intervened in the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Davenport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this as a stunt before the federal election in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Lakini Waziri Mkuu John Howard alisema kitendo hicho kilikuwa tu cha kulinda majengo ya hospitali kutokana na kushushwa hadhi na serikali ya Tasmania, kwa kutoa dola milioni 45 za Australia.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the move was simply to protect hospital buildings from the Tasmanian government, which had been offered $45 million of Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Kulingana na taarifa za hivi punde, vipimo vya kiwango cha bahari vilionyesha tufani ilizalishwa. Kulikuwa na baadhi ya shughuli dhahiri za tufani zilizorekodiwa karibu na Pago Pago na Niue.
mt: According to recent reports, sea level measurements showed a storm surge was generated. There were some notable storm activities recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Hakuna madhara makubwa au majeraha yaliyoripotiwa huko Tonga, lakini nguvu za umeme zilipotea kwa muda, hali ambayo iliripotiwa kuzuia mamlaka ya Tongan kupokea onyo la tsunami lililotolewa na PTWC.
mt: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was knocked out for a time, a development that was reported to have prevented Tongan authorities from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Shule kumi na nne katika Hawaii zilizoko au zilizo karibu na mipaka ya pwani zilifungwa siku nzima Jumatano licha ya tahadhari kuondolewa.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii or near the coastline were closed for the day on Monday despite the warning being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Rais wa marekani George W. Bush alikaribisha tangazo hilo.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Msemaji wa Bush Gordon Johndroe alitaja ahadi ya Korea Kaskazini kama “hatua kuu kuelekea lengo la kufikia uondoaji wa kuaminika wa silaha za kinyuklia katika rasi ya Kikorea.”
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge a "significant step toward the verified elimination of nuclear weapons in North Korea."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Dhoruba ya kumi iliyopewa jina ya msimu wa Kimbunga cha Atlantiki, Dhoruba ya Nusutropiki ya Jerry, iliundwa katika Bahari ya Atlantiki leo.
mt: 10-day storm named for the Atlantic hurricane season, Jerry's North Atlantic Tropical Storm, was formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Kituo cha Kitaifa cha Vimbunga (NHC) kinasema kwamba wakati huu, Jerry hakitoi tishio kwa ardhi.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says at this time, Jerry does not pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Corps of Engineers cha Marekani kilikadiria kwamba inchi 6 za mvua huenda zikabomoa matuta ambayo yaliharibiwa awali.
mt: 6 inches of rain could flood roads that were damaged earlier.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Wadi ya Tisa, ambayo ilishuhudia mafuriko ya hadi futi 20 kwa kimo wakati wa Kimbunga Katrina, sasa iko kwenye maji yanayofikia kiunoni kwani tuta lililokuwa karibu lilifurika.
mt: 10th Street, which witnessed up to 20 feet of flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now underwater again as the nearby lake that was close to overflowing has flooded.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Maji yanamwagika juu ya tuta katika sehemu ya futi 100 upana.
mt: 100 feet of pipe is leaking water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Msimamizi wa Commons Adam Cuerden alielezea kufadhaika kwake kuhusu ufutaji huo alipoongea na Wikinews mwezi uliopita.
mt: Commons Manager Adam Cuerden described his frustration with that deletion in a conversation with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Yeye [Wales] kimsingi alindanganya tangu mwanzo. Kwanza kwa kufanya kama hii ni kwa sababu za kisheria. Pili, kwa kujifanya alikuwa anatusikiliza, hadi saana yake ifutwe."
mt: "He [Wales] has been misleading us from the start. First, because of legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen, until his time is up."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Hasira ya jamii imesababisha juhudi za sasa za kutayarisha sera kuhusu kadiri ya ngono kwa wavuti ambayo inakaribisha mamilioni ya vyombo vya habari vilivyo na leseni wazi.
mt: Community outrage has led to current efforts to draft a policy on the extent of pornography allowed on websites that have millions of registered users.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kazi iliyofanywa ilikuwa hasa ya nadharia, lakini programu ilitengenezwa ili kuiga mitazamo iliyofanywa ya galaksi ya Mshale.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was developed to simulate the behavior of the M81 galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Athari ambayo timu ilikuwa ikitafuta ingesababishwa na nguvu za mawimbi baina ya dutu nyeusi za galaksia na dutu nyeusi za Kilimia.
mt: The effect that the team was looking for was caused by the gravitational pull between the black hole and the black hole of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Kama vile mwezi unavuta nguvu duniani, na kusababisha mawimbi, vivyo hivyo ndivyo Njia ya Kimaziwa hutia nguvu kwenye giligili la alama ya Mshale.
mt: As the moon pulls the tides, so the tide route pulls the tide gauge.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Wanasayansi waliweza kuhitimisha kuwa udusi mweusi unaathiri udusi mwingine mweusi kwa njia ile ile ya kawaida.
mt: Scientists have found that black skin inhibits the spread of other black skin in the same way.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Nadharia hii inasema kuwa dutu nyingi yenye giza inayozingira galaksi iko karibu na galaksi kwa aina ya mwangaza, na inatengenezwa kwa chembechembe nyingi ndogo.
mt: This theory says that dark matter that surrounds galaxies is close to galaxies of a certain brightness, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Ripoti kwenye televisheni zinaonyesha moshi mweupe unaotoka kwenye mmea huo.
mt: A report on television shows white smoke coming from the tree.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Mamlaka ya ndani inaonya wakaaji walio karibu na mmea huo kukaa ndani, kuzima viyoyozi na kutokunywa maji ya bomba.
mt: The authorities are advising residents near the area to stay indoors, close windows and not drink water from the fire hydrants.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Kulingana na shirika la nyuklia la Japan, mionzi, cesiamu na iodini zimetambuliwa kiwandani.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive iodine and cesium have been detected inside.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Serikali inabashiri kuwa hii inaonyesha kuwa vyombo vinayokuwa na Urani kwenye tovuti vinaweza kuwa vimetoboka na vinavuja.
mt: The government warns that this shows that sites with Uranium on the Internet can be hacked and compromised.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dk. Tony Moll aligundua Kifua Kikuu Kinachokinza Dawa Kabisa (XDR-TB) katika eneo la KwaZulu-Natal, Afrika Kusini.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll identified extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Katika mahojiano, alisema aina mpya ilikuwa "ya kusumbua sana na ya kutisha kwa sababu ya kiwango cha juu cha kufariki."
mt: In an interview, he said the new type was "very shocking and scary because of the high death rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Huenda baadhi ya wagonjwa waliambukizwa mdudu huyo hospitalini, kama anavyofikiria Dkt. Moll, na angalau wawili walikuwa wafanyakazi hospitalini.
mt: Some patients may have been infected at the hospital, as Dr. Moll believes, and at least two were hospital employees.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
